post.summary: Request stalking analysis for provided social profiles
Send chat messages to the system

200.description: Sets JWT token in httpOnly cookie and returns user info

post.summary: Logout user by clearing auth cookie
Refresh access token using refresh token

get.summary: Get a specific chat by ID

200.description: Returns list of listings with favorite status

get.summary: Get listings for a specific chat
Get all favorite listings for the current user

404.description: Feedback not found for this chat

get.summary: Get feedback for a specific chat
Get all messages for a specific chat

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: Client identifier to register for SSE

get.description: Checks database and RabbitMQ connectivity. Returns 503 if any dependency is unhealthy.

503.description: The Health Check is not successful

get.description: Kubernetes-style readiness probe. Checks if service is ready to handle requests.

503.description: The Health Check is not successful

get.description: Kubernetes-style liveness probe. Checks if application is running.

503.description: The Health Check is not successful

get.description: Checks RabbitMQ message broker connectivity only.

503.description: The Health Check is not successful

info.title: AI Present Finder - REST API
info.description: REST API for interacting with microservices: stalking requests, sending chat messages and streaming events via SSE.

profileId.description: Optional user profile ID to load existing profile

minPrice.description: Minimum price for gift search (in PLN)

maxPrice.description: Maximum price for gift search (in PLN)

ageRange.description: Age range of the gift recipient

what_is_missing.description: Items the recipient needs or would benefit from

personalInfoDescription.description: Basic personal information about the gift recipient

lifestyleDescription.example: Works from home, enjoys gaming and coffee, prefers minimalist design

preferencesDescription.example: Loves tech gadgets, prefers modern aesthetics, enjoys craft coffee

recentLifeDescription.example: Recently started working remotely, experiencing back pain from poor posture

possessions.description: Information about what the recipient already has and what they need

keyThemesAndKeywords.description: Key themes and keywords from the interview

chatName.description: Display name for the chat session

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the chat was created

isInterviewCompleted.description: Indicates whether the gift interview process has been completed

giftCount.description: Total number of gift suggestions generated in this chat

reasoningSummary.description: Summary of the reasoning behind gift suggestions

chats.description: Array of chat sessions belonging to the user

reasoningSummary.description: Reasoning summary with recipient profile and key themes

chatId.description: Chat ID this listing belongs to

isFavorited.description: Whether this listing is favorited by the current user

listings.description: List of listings for the chat

listingId.description: Listing ID to add to favorites

chatId.description: ID of the chat to provide feedback for

comment.description: Optional comment about the chat experience

chatId.description: ID of the chat this feedback is for

userId.description: ID of the user who provided the feedback

comment.description: Optional comment about the chat experience

updatedAt.description: When the feedback was last updated

content.example: I'm looking for a gift for my mom

chatId.description: Chat ID associated with this profile

potentialAnswers.description: Potential answers - either select with 4 options or free text

reason.description: Reason why the request was inappropriate

data.description: Gift ideas payload with listing IDs
